movies.title: The Guvnors
movies.plot: The Guvnors is both love letter and hate mail to the alpha male. This story's alpha is Mitch who lives buried in suburban London, having turned his back on his previous life of casual violence and intimidation as part of a legendary South East London firm. In the modern day he's the doyen of respectability and quiet confidence, but Mitch used to be a Guv'nor. This film holds a mirror up to Mitch and shows him the monster once again, buried deep in both DNA and psyche, desperate to break out and wreak havoc.
movies.simplePlot: The Guvnors is a violent thriller set amongst the clans and firms of South East London, bringing two generations together in brutal conflict.

biography.bio: Charley Palmer Rothwell was born on February 9, 1992 in Bethnal Green, London, England. He is an actor, known for Legend (2015), iBoy (2017) and Plastic (2014).
biography.name: Charley Palmer Rothwell

biography.bio: Tom Davis is a character actor and stand up. A former scaffolder and market stall trader Davis first came to public attention as part of the channel 4 sketch show "The Morgana Show" in 2010. Since then he has gone on to work with some of the UK's top comedy talent, including Steve Coogan, Leigh Francis, David Walliams and Catherine Tate. He has appeared in films with Bob Hoskins, Vince Reagan and Gabrial Byrne. In 2013 he received plaudits for his writing debut "Common Ground" a biographical look at his background.
biography.name: Tom Davis

biography.bio: Martin Hancock was born in 1973 in the UK. He is an actor, known for Kingdom of Heaven (2005), Defiance (2008) and 24 Hour Party People (2002).
biography.name: Martin Hancock

biography.bio: Vas Blackwood was born on October 19, 1962 in St Pancras, London, England as Vasta Roy Blackwood. He is an actor, known for Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels (1998), Creep (2004) and Mean Machine (2001).
biography.name: Vas Blackwood

biography.bio: Doug Allen is an actor, known for Gangster No. 1 (2000), The Guvnors (2014) and Band of Brothers (2001).
biography.name: Doug Allen

biography.bio: Chris Martin Hill is known for his work on Essex Boys: Law of Survival (2015), Ten (2013) and Housefull 3 (2016).
biography.name: Chris Martin Hill

biography.bio: Jay Simpson was born in 1966 in London, England. He is an actor, known for Pride & Prejudice (2005), Rush (2013) and The Holiday (2006).
biography.name: Jay Simpson

biography.bio: David Essex was born on July 23, 1947 in Plaistow, London, England as David Albert Cook. He is an Singer, Performer and actor, for The Devil's Rejects (2005), That'll Be the Day (1973) and Stardust (1974). He has been married to Susan Hallam-Wright since September 20, 2010. He was previously married to Carlotta Chrccisty and Maureen Neal.
biography.name: David Essex

biography.bio: Sue is a Tv/Film Extra and likes working on set as well as off set, She like's working behind the scenes and being part of a production team, Sue has also gained experience in casting extras for films. She is a lively, happy, bubbly person and has a great sense of humor.. Plus she is a twin, if there are any twin fans out there.
biography.name: Susan Fordham

biography.bio: Lee Nicholas Harris is known for his work on World War Z (2013), The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence) (2011) and Trance (2013).
biography.name: Lee Nicholas Harris

biography.bio: Lorraine Stanley was born on June 28, 1976 in Portsmouth, Hampshire, England as Lorraine Marie Stanley. She is an actress and producer, known for London to Brighton (2006), Made in Dagenham (2010) and Eden Lake (2008).
biography.name: Lorraine Stanley

biography.bio: Paul Reynolds made his start as a child actor in a variety of small parts, but became most recognized for his role as "Colin Matthews" on the BAFTA award winning hit English program, Press Gang (1989). Portraying "Colin Matthews", a character who needs no introduction, and usually received little on the show, Paul gathered a semi-cult following among fans of the show. On the big screen, Paul celebrated the satisfying success of L'âge de vivre (1991) where he starred opposite the by-no-means-small British star Christopher Eccleston. Giving off a wonderful performance as a disturbed youth, Paul showed us that "Colin"'s limitations ("He can't really understand anything that can't be expressed as money" - a perfect description of "Colin", as told by 'Lynda Day') in no way reflected on his boundaries as an actor - boundaries that have yet to be made. With his sarcastic grin, and wily eyebrows, Paul Reynolds has made his mark on the world of entertainment.
biography.name: Paul Reynolds

biography.bio: Tony Denham is an actor, known for Au nom du père (1993), The Football Factory (2004) and Revolver (2005).
biography.name: Tony Denham

biography.bio: Paul Terry is known for his work on King Arthur: Legend of the Sword (2017), London Hood (2014) and The Newspaper (2015).
biography.name: Paul Terry

biography.bio: Jumayn Hunter is an actor, known for Eden Lake (2008), Attack the Block (2011) and Quartet (2012).
biography.name: Jumayn Hunter
